description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-20669):

1. Install the relevant KB updates corresponding to your Windows build:
   - KB-5036925
   - KB-5036899
   - KB-5036896
   - KB-5036894
   - KB-5036893
   - KB-5036892

2. Verify the installation by checking the build number.

**Details**:
- Ensure your system is updated to one of the following builds:
  - 10.0.19045.4291
  - 10.0.19044.4291
  - 10.0.22631.3447
  - 10.0.22000.2899
  - 10.0.22621.3447
  - 10.0.10240.20596
- For detailed instructions on applying these updates, refer to the official Microsoft Update Guide: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-20669.
